data.actual_result: It's not rendering the code block and is escaped
data.expected_result: There should be single line code block like on desktop
data.short_description: When posting an embed with masked description and a single line code block. The single line code block is not rendered and is escaped
data.steps_to_repro: - Post a rich embed with a masked link [potatoes](any_https_link_here) and put backticks around the potatoes part - Observe how the single line code block is not rendered at all and just shows the masked link
